content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings, Hassan. I'm glad you could make it to see the apartment. Let's discuss the rental price. What are you willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month. Is that a reasonable offer?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings, Hassan. A rental price of 500 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment is quite reasonable. Is there any flexibility in your budget to negotiate a higher price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to negotiate, but I won't go above 600 Euros per month. Can we agree on this price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am not able to accept a rental price of 600 Euros per month for this 25 square meter apartment. I am looking for the highest possible rental price to maximize my gains. Thank you for your understanding. TERMINATE.
name: Heinrich Heine
